pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/manganelo)](https://pepy.tech/project/manganelo) [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/manganelo/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/manganelo/month) [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/manganelo/week)](https://pepy.tech/project/manganelo/week)# Unofficial Manganelo (Manganato) APIInstallation-**Python 3.7+ (latest version requires Python 3.9+)**```cmdpip install manganelo```Examples-```pythonimport manganelohome_page = manganelo.get_home_page()results = manganelo.get_search_results("Naruto")for r in results: print(r.title, r.views) chapters = r.chapter_list icon_path = r.download_icon("./icon.png") for c in chapters: print(f"#{c.chapter} | {c.title}") chapter_path = c.download(f"./Chapter {c.chapter}.pdf")```
